node.title: Myanmar frees jailed American journalist Danny Fenster three days after 11-year jail sentence
node.alt: A man wearing glasses works on a laptop out of the back of a van
node.description: His release was confirmed by his employer, Sonny Swe, the publisher of Frontier Myanmar, and former US ambassador Bill Richardson, who says Mr Fenster will fly home via Qatar.
node.content:
["US journalist Danny Fenster has been freed\u00a0from\u00a0prison in Myanmar just three days after he was sentenced to 11 years in jail for incitement and breaches of immigration and terrorism laws.", "His release was confirmed on social media\u00a0by his employer,\u00a0Sonny Swe, the publisher of Frontier Myanmar.", "\"Great news. I heard @DannyFenster is out,\" Mr\u00a0Swe wrote on Twitter.", "Bill Richardson,\u00a0former US ambassador to the UN, also announced the news in a statement, saying he had been handed over to him in Myanmar and would soon be on his way home via Qatar.", "\"This is the day that you hope will come when you do this work,\" Mr Richardson said.", "", "
Bill Richardson says Mr Fenster will fly back to the US via Qatar after his release.\u00a0
", "Mr Richardson says he negotiated the journalist's\u00a0release during a recent visit to Myanmar when he held face-to-face meetings with military leader\u00a0Min Aung Hlaing.", "Mr Fenster, 37, is managing editor\u00a0of online magazine Frontier Myanmar and was arrested in May while trying to leave Myanmar, a country in chaos since the February\u00a01 military coup.", "He was the first Western journalist sentenced to prison in recent years in Myanmar.", "The coup against the elected government led\u00a0by Nobel laureate Aung San Suu Kyi ended a decade of tentative steps towards democracy and triggered nationwide protests.", "The military has arrested dozens of journalists among thousands detained after protests erupted nationwide.", "The US State Department spokesman Ned Price last week condemned the sentence for Mr Fenster, saying it was \"an unjust conviction of an innocent person.\"", "Wires/ABC"]
